br.span: Thursday, April 16 update from Superintendent Russell - click
Governor Sununu declared that all public schools in NH will continue remote learning for the rest of the school year.
During this time, teachers and staff will be working remotely to support students and the needs of the Hudson community.
School buildings and the Superintendent's Office will be closed. Please contact your child's teacher or the school if you need anything.

strong.span: Extended Closure Breakfast Lunch Pick Up Program

br.span:
Grab and Go Lunches are distributed from Hudson Memorial School on Mondays and Thursdays from 10:30 1:00.
On Mondays, students will receive lunches for Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday and on Thursdays they will receive lunches for Thursday and Friday as well as the weekend backpacks.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(38, 38, 38);

p.span:
Due to the Governors stay-at-home order, the board meeting will be held remotely via Zoom.*
Hudson residents may submit agenda-related public input to the board by emailing info@sau81.org. Please note in the message if you would like your comment to be posted with the board materials and include your full name and street address. All messages should be sent by 3:00 pm on Monday.
Watch on your TV: Comcast Channel 21
Watch online: HCTV Education Channel
Watch on Facebook: Hudson Community Television-NH
*Zoom provides a remote conferencing service that combines video conferencing, online meetings, chat, and phone collaboration.
Zoom call-in information will be posted here on Monday, April 20 by 5pm.
If you are having trouble, please call (603) 897-5163 or email info@sau81.org

br.br: Registration for 2020-2021 is now open. Click here.

p.style: margin-bottom: 15px; line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;

p.span:
The Missionof the Hudson School District is to:
Innovative learning practices and empowered educators facilitate and inspire learners to achieve personal academic excellence in a safe and dynamic environment that elevates their engagement as valued active community members.
